com.github.sanity4j.report

Class ReportUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.report.ReportUtil

  • public final class ReportUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    General utility methods used by the report classes.
    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

      • evaluateMetric

        public static double evaluateMetric(java.lang.String metric,
                                    DiagnosticSet diagnostics,
                                    int linesOfCode)
        Evaluates the given metric for a package/class with the given set of diagnostics.
        Parameters:
        metric - the metric name, as defined in report.properties
        diagnostics - the diagnostics for the package/class
        linesOfCode - the number of lines of code
        Returns:
        the value of the given metric, or -1 on error.

      • evaluateMetric

        public static double evaluateMetric(java.lang.String metric,
                                    PackageSummary summary)
        Evaluates the given metric for a package/class with the given set of diagnostics.
        Parameters:
        metric - the metric name, as defined in report.properties
        summary - the summary for the package
        Returns:
        the value of the given metric, or -1 on error.
